_meta.description: Verified MetaSounds node catalogue -- generated from metasound_nodes.py

nodes.name: AD Envelope
nodes.description: Attack-Decay envelope — real UE5 node name. Outputs audio-rate envelope signal. Pin names verified from engine exports.
nodes.mcp_notes: Shape amplitude/parameter over time. Trigger pin connects to Blueprint events. Use Audio variant for audio-rate modulation, Float for control-rate.

nodes.name: AD Envelope (Audio)
nodes.description: Attack-Decay envelope outputting audio-rate signal. Engine variant name: AD Envelope::AD Envelope::Audio. Pins verified from exports.
nodes.mcp_notes: Percussive envelope -- no sustain. Ideal for hits, transients. Trigger from BP events.

nodes.name: AD Envelope (Float)
nodes.description: Attack-Decay envelope outputting block-rate float. Engine variant name: AD Envelope::AD Envelope::Float. Pins verified from exports.
nodes.mcp_notes: Shape amplitude/parameter over time. Trigger pin connects to Blueprint events. Use Audio variant for audio-rate modulation, Float for control-rate.

nodes.name: ADSR Envelope
nodes.description: The ADSR Envelope node generates an attack-decay-sustain-release envelope value output when triggered. This node is similar to the AD Envelope node, but it requires a separate release trigger for t...
nodes.mcp_notes: Shape amplitude/parameter over time. Trigger pin connects to Blueprint events. Use Audio variant for audio-rate modulation, Float for control-rate.

nodes.name: ADSR Envelope (Audio)
nodes.description: Full ADSR envelope outputting audio-rate signal for sustained sounds.
nodes.mcp_notes: Full ADSR for sustained sounds. Gate trigger from BP, expose Attack/Release as params.

nodes.name: ADSR Envelope (Float)
nodes.description: Full ADSR envelope outputting block-rate float.
nodes.mcp_notes: Shape amplitude/parameter over time. Trigger pin connects to Blueprint events. Use Audio variant for audio-rate modulation, Float for control-rate.

nodes.name: Abs
nodes.description: Returns the absolute value of a float.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Add
nodes.description: Adds two values (Float, Audio, or Int32). Operates on Float data.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Add (Audio)
nodes.description: Adds two values (Float, Audio, or Int32). Operates on Audio data.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Add (Int32)
nodes.description: Adds two values (Float, Audio, or Int32). Operates on Int32 data.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Additive Synth
nodes.description: Generates audio from a bank of sine partials with controllable amplitudes.
nodes.mcp_notes: Use as audio source in MetaSounds layer. Trigger from Blueprint events, expose Frequency as graph input for BP SetFloatParameter.

nodes.name: Array Concatenate
nodes.description: Concatenates two arrays into one.

nodes.name: Array Get
nodes.description: Gets an element from an array at the specified index.

nodes.name: Array Num
nodes.description: Returns the number of elements in an array.

nodes.name: Array Set
nodes.description: Sets an element in an array at the specified index.

nodes.name: Array Shuffle
nodes.description: Returns array elements in random order without repeats until exhausted.

nodes.name: Array Subset
nodes.description: Extracts a contiguous subset of elements from an array.

nodes.name: Audio Bus Reader
nodes.description: Reads audio from a submix bus for routing or analysis.

nodes.name: Audio Mixer (Mono, 2)
nodes.description: 2-input mono mixer — real UE5 node name. Mixes two mono signals with per-input gain.
nodes.mcp_notes: Combine multiple audio streams. Use Stereo Mixer for L/R panning, Mono Mixer for summing layers before effects chain.

nodes.name: Audio Mixer (Mono, 3)
nodes.description: 3-input mono mixer — real UE5 node name. Mixes three mono signals with per-input gain. Engine class: AudioMixer::Audio Mixer (Mono, 3)::None. Pin names verified from exports.
nodes.mcp_notes: Combine multiple audio streams. Use Stereo Mixer for L/R panning, Mono Mixer for summing layers before effects chain.

nodes.name: Audio Mixer (Stereo, 2)
nodes.description: 2-input stereo mixer — real UE5 node name. Mixes two stereo pairs with per-input gain. Pin names use 'In N L/R' format. From Chris Payne Sound Pads project binary extraction.
nodes.mcp_notes: Combine multiple audio streams. Use Stereo Mixer for L/R panning, Mono Mixer for summing layers before effects chain.

nodes.name: Audio To Float
nodes.description: Converts an audio-rate signal to a block-rate float value. Engine class: UE::ConversionAudioToFloat::None. Pin names verified from exports.

nodes.name: BPM To Seconds
nodes.description: Converts beats per minute to a time duration per beat in seconds. Engine class: UE::BPMToSeconds::None. Output is Time type.
nodes.mcp_notes: MIDI/pitch utilities. Convert MIDI note numbers from BP Int32 params to Hz. Use BPM To Seconds for tempo-synced timing.

nodes.name: Biquad Filter
nodes.description: Versatile second-order filter with selectable type (LPF, HPF, BPF, Notch, etc.). Pin names verified from engine exports.
nodes.mcp_notes: Versatile 2nd-order filter. Wire Type+Frequency+Gain from BP for runtime EQ control.

nodes.name: BitCrusher
nodes.description: Reduces sample rate and bit depth for lo-fi / aliased spectral effects. Low Sample Rate creates aliasing. Low Bit Depth creates quantization noise. From SFX Generator — used for harsh spectral output.
nodes.mcp_notes: Chain after generators/filters. Expose mix/feedback params to Blueprint for runtime control. Route wet signal to Wwise via AudioLink.

nodes.name: Bitcrusher
nodes.description: Reduces bit depth and/or sample rate for lo-fi distortion effects.
nodes.mcp_notes: Chain after generators. Wire cutoff/resonance from BP params via SetFloatParameter. Use Biquad for general EQ, Ladder for resonant synth.

nodes.name: Clamp
nodes.description: Clamps a float value between min and max bounds.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Compressor
nodes.description: Dynamic range compressor with threshold/ratio/knee, parallel mix (Wet/Dry), optional analog modeling, peak/RMS envelope modes, and upwards compression. At 30:1 ratio with low threshold acts as brick-wall limiter for vehicle/engine layers.
nodes.mcp_notes: Dynamic range control. Place before output for loudness management.

nodes.name: Concatenate
nodes.description: The Concatenate node concatenates two arrays on a given trigger.

nodes.name: Convert
nodes.description: Converts between compatible MetaSound data types.

nodes.name: Crossfade
nodes.description: Crossfade between two audio signals using a 0-1 control value.
nodes.mcp_notes: Blend between two audio sources. Wire blend factor from BP for state transitions.

nodes.name: Crossfade (Audio, 2)
nodes.description: Crossfades between two audio inputs based on a float value (0.0 = In 0, 1.0 = In 1). Used for wet/dry mixing on effects chains. From SFX Generator.
nodes.mcp_notes: Chain after generators/filters. Expose mix/feedback params to Blueprint for runtime control. Route wet signal to Wwise via AudioLink.

nodes.name: Decibels to Linear Gain
nodes.description: Converts a decibel value to a linear gain multiplier.
nodes.mcp_notes: Compressor/limiter for loudness management. Place before final output. Expose threshold as BP param for adaptive mixing.

nodes.name: Delay
nodes.description: Mono delay line with dry/wet mix.

nodes.name: Delay (Time)
nodes.description: Audio delay effect with feedback. Delay Time in seconds, Dry Level controls direct signal, Feedback controls repeats. From SFX Generator temporal effects section.
nodes.mcp_notes: Chain after generators/filters. Expose mix/feedback params to Blueprint for runtime control. Route wet signal to Wwise via AudioLink.

nodes.name: Delay Pitch Shift
nodes.description: Pitch shifting via delay line manipulation (granular pitch shift).

nodes.name: Diffuser
nodes.description: Multi-tap diffusion network for reverb-like smearing of transients.

nodes.name: Divide
nodes.description: Divides first value by second. Operates on Float data.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Divide (Audio)
nodes.description: Divides first value by second. Operates on Audio data.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Divide (Int32)
nodes.description: Divides first value by second. Operates on Int32 data.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Dynamic Filter
nodes.description: Biquad filter with audio-rate modulation of cutoff frequency.
nodes.mcp_notes: Filter with audio-rate cutoff input. Use for envelope-following or LFO modulation.

nodes.name: Envelope Follower
nodes.description: Tracks the amplitude envelope of an incoming audio signal.
nodes.mcp_notes: Shape amplitude/parameter over time. Trigger pin connects to Blueprint events. Use Audio variant for audio-rate modulation, Float for control-rate.

nodes.name: Evaluate WaveTable
nodes.description: Looks up a wavetable value at a given position (0-1).
nodes.mcp_notes: Shape amplitude/parameter over time. Trigger pin connects to Blueprint events. Use Audio variant for audio-rate modulation, Float for control-rate.

nodes.name: Filter Q To Bandwidth
nodes.description: Converts filter Q factor to bandwidth value (octaves).
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Flanger
nodes.description: Flanger effect using modulated short delay line.

nodes.name: Float Compare
nodes.description: Compares two float values and outputs a boolean. CompareOp: LessThan, GreaterThan, Equals, LessThanOrEqual, GreaterThanOrEqual.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Float To Int
nodes.description: Converts a Float value to Int32 (truncation).

nodes.name: Frequency To MIDI
nodes.description: Converts a frequency in Hz to a MIDI note number.
nodes.mcp_notes: MIDI/pitch utilities. Convert MIDI note numbers from BP Int32 params to Hz. Use BPM To Seconds for tempo-synced timing.

nodes.name: Get
nodes.description: The Get node retrieves an element from an array at the given index.

nodes.name: Get Variable
nodes.description: Reads the current value of a graph variable.

nodes.name: Get Wave Duration
nodes.description: Returns the duration of a WaveAsset in seconds. Simpler alternative to Get Wave Info.

nodes.name: Get Wave Info
nodes.description: Extracts metadata from a WaveAsset: channel count, sample rate, duration.

nodes.name: Get WaveTable From Bank
nodes.description: Extracts a single wavetable from a wavetable bank asset by index.

nodes.name: Grain Delay
nodes.description: Granular delay with grain size, density, and pitch shift controls.

nodes.name: ITD Panner
nodes.description: Interaural Time Difference panner for binaural 3D audio on headphones.
nodes.mcp_notes: Binaural panner with interaural time difference. Wire Angle from BP actor azimuth.

nodes.name: Int To Float
nodes.description: Converts an Int32 value to Float.

nodes.name: InterpTo
nodes.description: Smoothly interpolates from current value toward target at a given speed.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Ladder Filter
nodes.description: Classic 4-pole ladder filter topology with resonance.
nodes.mcp_notes: Resonant 4-pole filter. Classic synth sound. Wire cutoff from BP for filter sweeps.

nodes.name: Limiter
nodes.description: Hard limiter / brick-wall limiter preventing signal from exceeding threshold.
nodes.mcp_notes: Compressor/limiter for loudness management. Place before final output. Expose threshold as BP param for adaptive mixing.

nodes.name: Linear Gain to Decibels
nodes.description: Converts a linear gain multiplier to decibel value.
nodes.mcp_notes: Compressor/limiter for loudness management. Place before final output. Expose threshold as BP param for adaptive mixing.

nodes.name: Linear To Log Frequency
nodes.description: Maps a normalized 0-1 value to a logarithmic frequency range (Hz). Min/Max Domain define input range, Min/Max Range define output Hz range. Essential for frequency knobs: linear knob → perceptually even pitch. From SFX Generator base frequency section.
nodes.mcp_notes: Analysis and routing nodes. Envelope Follower for sidechain, Audio To Float for metering back to Blueprint.

nodes.name: Log
nodes.description: Computes the natural logarithm of a float.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Low Frequency Noise
nodes.description: Generates smooth random noise at low frequencies for organic modulation.
nodes.mcp_notes: Use as audio source in MetaSounds layer. Trigger from Blueprint events, expose Frequency as graph input for BP SetFloatParameter.

nodes.name: Low-Frequency Oscillator
nodes.description: LFO for modulation: sine, saw, square, triangle, sample-and-hold shapes.
nodes.mcp_notes: Use as audio source in MetaSounds layer. Trigger from Blueprint events, expose Frequency as graph input for BP SetFloatParameter.

nodes.name: MIDI Note Quantizer
nodes.description: Quantizes a MIDI note number to the nearest note in a given scale. Engine class: UE::MIDI Note Quantizer::Audio. All pins are Float type.
nodes.mcp_notes: MIDI/pitch utilities. Convert MIDI note numbers from BP Int32 params to Hz. Use BPM To Seconds for tempo-synced timing.

nodes.name: MIDI To Frequency
nodes.description: Converts a MIDI note number to frequency in Hz. Engine class: UE::MIDI To Frequency::Float. Input is Float (supports fractional MIDI). Best practice: send MIDI values from Blueprint, convert to Hz here inside MetaSounds.
nodes.mcp_notes: Convert MIDI note (Int32) to Hz (Float). Wire from BP for musical pitch control.

nodes.name: MSP_CrossFadeByParam_3Inputs
nodes.description: 3-layer distance crossfade patch. Each layer: Shuffle→WavePlayer→MapRange gain→StereoMixer. Includes optimization gates (only processes active layers) and Mid-Side mono output. From Craig Owen weapon audio tutorial.

nodes.name: MSP_HeightEQ_Node
nodes.description: Height-based EQ for 3D spatialization. Applies frequency shaping based on azimuth and elevation angles for realistic height perception. From Craig Owen tutorial.
nodes.mcp_notes: 3D positioning nodes. ITD Panner for binaural, Stereo Panner for simple L/R. Wire azimuth/elevation from BP actor transforms.

nodes.name: MSP_RandomizationNode
nodes.description: Wave asset array player with per-shot pitch and volume randomization. Selects from WaveAsset array on each Next trigger, applies random pitch/volume offsets. Used for weapon burst round-robin layers. From Craig Owen weapon burst tutorial.

nodes.name: MSP_Switch_3Inputs
nodes.description: Hard switch between 3 WaveAsset array inputs based on an Int32 parameter (0/1/2). Used for room-size selection in weapon audio. Each input: Shuffle→WavePlayer→StereoMixer.

nodes.name: Map Range
nodes.description: Remaps a float from one range to another (linear interpolation).
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Max
nodes.description: Returns the larger of two float values.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Mid-Side Decode
nodes.description: The Mid-Side Decode node converts a stereo signal with mid and side channels to left and right channels.
nodes.mcp_notes: 3D positioning nodes. ITD Panner for binaural, Stereo Panner for simple L/R. Wire azimuth/elevation from BP actor transforms.

nodes.name: Mid-Side Encode
nodes.description: The Mid-Side Encode node converts a stereo signal with left and right channels to mid and side channels.
nodes.mcp_notes: 3D positioning nodes. ITD Panner for binaural, Stereo Panner for simple L/R. Wire azimuth/elevation from BP actor transforms.

nodes.name: Mid-Side Encode/Decode
nodes.description: Converts between stereo L/R and mid/side representation for width control.
nodes.mcp_notes: 3D positioning nodes. ITD Panner for binaural, Stereo Panner for simple L/R. Wire azimuth/elevation from BP actor transforms.

nodes.name: Min
nodes.description: Returns the smaller of two float values.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Modulo
nodes.description: Returns the remainder of dividing A by B.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Mono Band Splitter
nodes.description: Splits mono audio into low, mid, and high frequency bands.
nodes.mcp_notes: Chain after generators. Wire cutoff/resonance from BP params via SetFloatParameter. Use Biquad for general EQ, Ladder for resonant synth.

nodes.name: Mono Mixer
nodes.description: Mixes N mono audio inputs into a single mono output with per-input gain. Real UE5 pin names: In 0..N, Gain 0..N (Lin), Out.
nodes.mcp_notes: Combine multiple audio streams. Use Stereo Mixer for L/R panning, Mono Mixer for summing layers before effects chain.

nodes.name: Multiply
nodes.description: Multiplies two values (commonly used for amplitude modulation). Operates on Float data.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Multiply (Audio by Float)
nodes.description: Multiplies audio signal by a float gain value. Common for volume/amplitude control.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Multiply (Audio)
nodes.description: Multiplies two values (commonly used for amplitude modulation). Operates on Audio data.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Multiply (Int32)
nodes.description: Multiplies two values (commonly used for amplitude modulation). Operates on Int32 data.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Musical Scale To Note Array
nodes.description: Generates a note array from a musical scale enum. Real UE5 node name from exports.
nodes.mcp_notes: MIDI/pitch utilities. Convert MIDI note numbers from BP Int32 params to Hz. Use BPM To Seconds for tempo-synced timing.

nodes.name: Noise
nodes.description: Generic noise generator with selectable type (White, Pink, etc.). Engine class: UE::Noise::Audio. Pin names verified from exports.
nodes.mcp_notes: Use as audio source in MetaSounds layer. Trigger from Blueprint events, expose Frequency as graph input for BP SetFloatParameter.

nodes.name: Noise (Pink)
nodes.description: Pink noise generator (1/f spectrum, equal energy per octave).
nodes.mcp_notes: Use as audio source in MetaSounds layer. Trigger from Blueprint events, expose Frequency as graph input for BP SetFloatParameter.

nodes.name: Noise (White)
nodes.description: White noise generator (flat spectrum, equal energy per frequency).
nodes.mcp_notes: Use as audio source in MetaSounds layer. Trigger from Blueprint events, expose Frequency as graph input for BP SetFloatParameter.

nodes.name: Num
nodes.description: The Num node returns the number of elements in the given array.

nodes.name: One-Pole High Pass Filter
nodes.description: Simple first-order high-pass filter -- removes low frequencies.
nodes.mcp_notes: Chain after generators. Wire cutoff/resonance from BP params via SetFloatParameter. Use Biquad for general EQ, Ladder for resonant synth.

nodes.name: One-Pole Low Pass Filter
nodes.description: Simple first-order low-pass filter -- removes high frequencies.
nodes.mcp_notes: Chain after generators. Wire cutoff/resonance from BP params via SetFloatParameter. Use Biquad for general EQ, Ladder for resonant synth.

nodes.name: Perlin Noise
nodes.description: Perlin-noise-based signal for smooth organic modulation.
nodes.mcp_notes: Use as audio source in MetaSounds layer. Trigger from Blueprint events, expose Frequency as graph input for BP SetFloatParameter.

nodes.name: Plate Reverb
nodes.description: Plate reverb effect — simulates metal plate vibration for dense, smooth reverb tails. From TechAudioTools SFX Generator (Eric Buchholz). Used as one of three parallel temporal effects (Delay + Flanger + Plate Reverb) in the send effects section.

nodes.name: Plate Reverb (Stereo)
nodes.description: Stereo plate reverb with bypass, separate dry/wet level controls. From SFX Generator temporal effects section.
nodes.mcp_notes: Chain after generators/filters. Expose mix/feedback params to Blueprint for runtime control. Route wet signal to Wwise via AudioLink.

nodes.name: Power
nodes.description: Raises base to the power of exponent.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Print Log
nodes.description: Prints a string to the output log when triggered.

nodes.name: Random Bool
nodes.description: Generates a random boolean value when triggered.
nodes.mcp_notes: Variation and randomization. Random Get for round-robin sample selection, Random Float for pitch/timing humanization.

nodes.name: Random Float
nodes.description: Generates a random float within a range when triggered. Engine class: UE::RandomFloat::None. Pin names verified from exports.
nodes.mcp_notes: Variation and randomization. Random Get for round-robin sample selection, Random Float for pitch/timing humanization.

nodes.name: Random Get (WaveAssetArray)
nodes.description: Gets a random element from a WaveAsset array, optionally weighted. No Repeats prevents consecutive duplicates. Enable Shared State syncs across instances.

nodes.name: Random Int
nodes.description: Generates a random integer within a range when triggered. Engine class: UE::RandomInt32::None. Pin names verified from exports.
nodes.mcp_notes: Variation and randomization. Random Get for round-robin sample selection, Random Float for pitch/timing humanization.

nodes.name: Random Time
nodes.description: Generates a random time duration within a range when triggered.
nodes.mcp_notes: Variation and randomization. Random Get for round-robin sample selection, Random Float for pitch/timing humanization.

nodes.name: Ring Mod
nodes.description: Ring modulator -- multiplies audio by a modulation oscillator.

nodes.name: Ring Modulator
nodes.description: Ring modulation — multiplies input signal by a modulator oscillator. Built-in AD envelope controls modulator depth. Creates metallic, inharmonic tones. From SFX Generator — last in spectral effects chain.
nodes.mcp_notes: Chain after generators/filters. Expose mix/feedback params to Blueprint for runtime control. Route wet signal to Wwise via AudioLink.

nodes.name: SID Chip
nodes.description: Complete MOS 6581/8580 SID chip emulation. 3 voices with oscillator+envelope, analog filter, FM cross-modulation, and per-voice volume (SIDKIT extensions).

nodes.name: SID Envelope
nodes.description: MOS 6581/8580 ADSR envelope generator with non-linear exponential decay and authentic SID timing including the ADSR delay bug.

nodes.name: SID Filter
nodes.description: MOS 6581/8580 analog filter emulation. Route any audio through the SID chip's non-linear two-integrator-loop biquad filter with voltage-controlled resistor model.

nodes.name: SID Oscillator
nodes.description: MOS 6581/8580 waveform generator. 24-bit accumulator with saw, triangle, pulse, noise, and combined waveforms from actual C64 chip samples.

nodes.name: SID Voice
nodes.description: Complete SID voice: oscillator x envelope. Combines waveform generation with ADSR in a single node for quick patching.

nodes.name: Sample And Hold
nodes.description: Samples the input signal value when triggered and holds it until next trigger.
nodes.mcp_notes: Chain after generators. Wire cutoff/resonance from BP params via SetFloatParameter. Use Biquad for general EQ, Ladder for resonant synth.

nodes.name: Saw
nodes.description: Band-limited sawtooth oscillator.
nodes.mcp_notes: Bright subtractive synth source. Chain with filter for classic analog sound.

nodes.name: Scale to Note Array
nodes.description: Generates an array of MIDI note numbers or frequencies for a musical scale.
nodes.mcp_notes: MIDI/pitch utilities. Convert MIDI note numbers from BP Int32 params to Hz. Use BPM To Seconds for tempo-synced timing.

nodes.name: Send
nodes.description: Routes audio to a named bus or side-chain destination.

nodes.name: Set
nodes.description: The Set node sets the value of a specified index in a given array.

nodes.name: Set Variable
nodes.description: Writes a new value to a graph variable. Execute pin triggers the write.

nodes.name: Shuffle
nodes.description: The Shuffle node outputs elements from a shuffled array.

nodes.name: Sine
nodes.description: Pure sine wave oscillator.
nodes.mcp_notes: Pure tone, ideal for UI beeps and FM carrier. Wire Frequency from BP SetFloatParameter.

nodes.name: Square
nodes.description: Band-limited square wave oscillator.
nodes.mcp_notes: Hollow synth tone. Pulse Width for PWM from BP param. Good for chiptune and bass.

nodes.name: State Variable Filter
nodes.description: Simultaneous lowpass, highpass, bandpass, and notch outputs.
nodes.mcp_notes: Multi-mode filter (LP/HP/BP/Notch). Wire mode select from BP enum param.

nodes.name: Stereo Band Splitter
nodes.description: Splits stereo audio into low, mid, and high frequency bands (L+R pairs).
nodes.mcp_notes: Chain after generators. Wire cutoff/resonance from BP params via SetFloatParameter. Use Biquad for general EQ, Ladder for resonant synth.

nodes.name: Stereo Delay
nodes.description: Stereo delay with independent L/R delay times and feedback.
nodes.mcp_notes: Ping-pong delay. Use for stereo width on ambience/music layers.

nodes.name: Stereo Mixer
nodes.description: Mixes N stereo audio input pairs into a single stereo output with per-input gain. Real UE5 pin names: In N L/R, Gain N (Lin), Out L/R. Variant suffix (N) sets input count: Stereo Mixer (2), (3), (4), (8).
nodes.mcp_notes: Combine multiple audio streams. Use Stereo Mixer for L/R panning, Mono Mixer for summing layers before effects chain.

nodes.name: Stereo Panner
nodes.description: Simple stereo pan from left (-1) to right (+1) for speaker output.
nodes.mcp_notes: Simple L/R panning. Wire Pan from BP for positional audio.

nodes.name: Subset
nodes.description: The Subset node returns a subset of an input array.

nodes.name: Subtract
nodes.description: Subtracts second value from first. Operates on Float data.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Subtract (Audio)
nodes.description: Subtracts second value from first. Operates on Audio data.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: Subtract (Int32)
nodes.description: Subtracts second value from first. Operates on Int32 data.
nodes.mcp_notes: Arithmetic on audio/float signals. Use Multiply for volume control, Add for mixing, MapRange for parameter scaling from BP values.

nodes.name: SuperOscillator
nodes.description: Multi-voice oscillator with waveform type selection, detuning, glide, and pulse-width control. Mono variant. Voices stacks unison voices with Detune spread. Entropy adds random per-voice drift. Blend crossfades between voices. Glide adds portamento between pitch changes. Limit Output prevents clipping when stacking many voices. Type: Saw/Square/Sine/Triangle. Best practice: send MIDI ints from Blueprint, convert to Hz with MIDI To Frequency inside MetaSounds.
nodes.mcp_notes: Multi-voice unison. Use for thick pads/leads. Wire Voices+Detune from BP for morphing.

nodes.name: Triangle
nodes.description: Band-limited triangle wave oscillator.
nodes.mcp_notes: Use as audio source in MetaSounds layer. Trigger from Blueprint events, expose Frequency as graph input for BP SetFloatParameter.

nodes.name: Trigger Accumulate
nodes.description: Counts incoming triggers and fires output when count reaches threshold.
nodes.mcp_notes: Event routing and timing. Trigger Repeat for looping patterns, Trigger Route for surface-type switching from BP enums.

nodes.name: Trigger Any
nodes.description: Fires output when any of its input triggers fire.
nodes.mcp_notes: Event routing and timing. Trigger Repeat for looping patterns, Trigger Route for surface-type switching from BP enums.

nodes.name: Trigger Compare
nodes.description: Compares a float value to a threshold and fires trigger when condition is met.
nodes.mcp_notes: Event routing and timing. Trigger Repeat for looping patterns, Trigger Route for surface-type switching from BP enums.

nodes.name: Trigger Compare (Int32)
nodes.description: Compares two Int32 values when triggered and fires True or False. Used for room/state selection.
nodes.mcp_notes: Event routing and timing. Trigger Repeat for looping patterns, Trigger Route for surface-type switching from BP enums.

nodes.name: Trigger Control
nodes.description: Gates or enables trigger flow based on a boolean control input.
nodes.mcp_notes: Event routing and timing. Trigger Repeat for looping patterns, Trigger Route for surface-type switching from BP enums.

nodes.name: Trigger Counter
nodes.description: Counts triggers up or down and exposes the current count. Pin names verified from engine exports.
nodes.mcp_notes: Event routing and timing. Trigger Repeat for looping patterns, Trigger Route for surface-type switching from BP enums.

nodes.name: Trigger Delay
nodes.description: Delays a trigger by a specified time duration.
nodes.mcp_notes: Event routing and timing. Trigger Repeat for looping patterns, Trigger Route for surface-type switching from BP enums.

nodes.name: Trigger Filter
nodes.description: Passes or blocks triggers based on probability. Each incoming trigger has a chance of passing through (Heads) or being blocked (Tails). Pin names verified from exports.
nodes.mcp_notes: Event routing and timing. Trigger Repeat for looping patterns, Trigger Route for surface-type switching from BP enums.

nodes.name: Trigger On Threshold
nodes.description: Fires trigger when a float value crosses a threshold (rising or falling).
nodes.mcp_notes: Event routing and timing. Trigger Repeat for looping patterns, Trigger Route for surface-type switching from BP enums.

nodes.name: Trigger On Threshold (Audio)
nodes.description: Fires a trigger when audio signal crosses a threshold. Type: Rising Edge or Falling Edge. Used with Envelope Follower to detect when a sound finishes (signal drops below threshold). From SFX Generator output section.
nodes.mcp_notes: Analysis and routing nodes. Envelope Follower for sidechain, Audio To Float for metering back to Blueprint.

nodes.name: Trigger On Value Change
nodes.description: Fires trigger whenever the input value changes.
nodes.mcp_notes: Event routing and timing. Trigger Repeat for looping patterns, Trigger Route for surface-type switching from BP enums.

nodes.name: Trigger Once
nodes.description: Fires only on the first incoming trigger, ignores all subsequent ones.
nodes.mcp_notes: Event routing and timing. Trigger Repeat for looping patterns, Trigger Route for surface-type switching from BP enums.

nodes.name: Trigger Pipe
nodes.description: Passes trigger through unchanged -- useful for debugging and routing.
nodes.mcp_notes: Event routing and timing. Trigger Repeat for looping patterns, Trigger Route for surface-type switching from BP enums.

nodes.name: Trigger Repeat
nodes.description: Repeats trigger at a regular interval (periodic timer). Engine class: UE::TriggerRepeat::None. Pin names verified from exports.
nodes.mcp_notes: Looping trigger generator. Use for rhythmic patterns, ambient loops.

nodes.name: Trigger Route
nodes.description: Routes trigger to one of N outputs based on an integer index.
nodes.mcp_notes: Route triggers by index. Use for surface-type switching (footsteps) from BP Int32.

nodes.name: Trigger Select
nodes.description: The Trigger Select node passes triggers through to the currently selected output trigger. This node has multiple versions for different input counts (between 2 and 8).
nodes.mcp_notes: Event routing and timing. Trigger Repeat for looping patterns, Trigger Route for surface-type switching from BP enums.

nodes.name: Trigger Sequence
nodes.description: Fires output triggers in sequential round-robin order (0, 1, 2, ...). When Loop is enabled, wraps back to Out 0 after the last output. Used for cycling through weapon shot layers.
nodes.mcp_notes: Event routing and timing. Trigger Repeat for looping patterns, Trigger Route for surface-type switching from BP enums.

nodes.name: Trigger Toggle
nodes.description: The Trigger Toggle node toggles a Bool value on or off.
nodes.mcp_notes: Event routing and timing. Trigger Repeat for looping patterns, Trigger Route for surface-type switching from BP enums.

nodes.name: Wave Player
nodes.description: The Wave Player node is used to play a Sound Wave asset. There are multiple versions of this node in order to support several different channel configurations, such as Mono, Stereo, Quad (4.0), 5.1...

nodes.name: Wave Player (5.1)
nodes.description: 5.1 surround wave file player.
nodes.mcp_notes: Sample playback node. Wire WaveAsset from graph input, trigger Play from Blueprint. Use Mono for 3D, Stereo for music/ambience.

nodes.name: Wave Player (7.1)
nodes.description: 7.1 surround wave file player.
nodes.mcp_notes: Sample playback node. Wire WaveAsset from graph input, trigger Play from Blueprint. Use Mono for 3D, Stereo for music/ambience.

nodes.name: Wave Player (Mono)
nodes.description: Mono wave file player with pitch shift, looping, and trigger outputs.
nodes.mcp_notes: Primary sample player. Use for one-shot SFX (gunshots, footsteps). Mono for 3D spatialization.

nodes.name: Wave Player (Quad)
nodes.description: Quad (4-channel) wave file player.
nodes.mcp_notes: Sample playback node. Wire WaveAsset from graph input, trigger Play from Blueprint. Use Mono for 3D, Stereo for music/ambience.

nodes.name: Wave Player (Stereo)
nodes.description: Stereo wave file player with L/R outputs and looping.
nodes.mcp_notes: Stereo sample player. Use for music, ambience. Not spatializable -- use for non-positional audio.

nodes.name: Wave Shaper
nodes.description: Waveshaping distortion -- soft clipping to hard clipping based on amount.

nodes.name: Wave Writer
nodes.description: Records audio to a WAV file on disk.

nodes.name: WaveShaper
nodes.description: Waveshaping distortion with configurable curve type. Amount controls drive, Bias shifts DC offset, OutputGain compensates volume. Type: Sine, HardClip, SoftClip, Tanh. From SFX Generator — first in spectral effects chain.
nodes.mcp_notes: Chain after generators/filters. Expose mix/feedback params to Blueprint for runtime control. Route wet signal to Wwise via AudioLink.

nodes.name: WaveTable Envelope
nodes.description: Envelope shaped by a wavetable for arbitrary envelope curves.
nodes.mcp_notes: Shape amplitude/parameter over time. Trigger pin connects to Blueprint events. Use Audio variant for audio-rate modulation, Float for control-rate.

nodes.name: WaveTable Oscillator
nodes.description: Oscillator that reads from a wavetable for arbitrary waveforms.
nodes.mcp_notes: Use as audio source in MetaSounds layer. Trigger from Blueprint events, expose Frequency as graph input for BP SetFloatParameter.

nodes.name: WaveTable Player
nodes.description: Plays a wavetable at a given position for single-cycle waveform use.
nodes.mcp_notes: Use as audio source in MetaSounds layer. Trigger from Blueprint events, expose Frequency as graph input for BP SetFloatParameter.
